dict.acceptation: 产生；出现；起身，起立；起源于，产生于；

sent.orig: Sally Whitemane says:Mograine has fallen!You shall pay for this treachery!Arise,my champion!Arise!
sent.trans: 莎丽·怀特迈恩说：莫格莱尼死了吗？你要为此付出代价！复活吧，我的勇士！

sent.orig: Leak electricity is easy to result in fire. Electric shock may arise accident.
sent.trans: 设备漏电容易引起火灾，触电会导致人身伤亡事故。

sent.orig: Pro6:9 How long wilt thou sleep, O sluggard? when wilt thou arise out of thy sleep?
sent.trans: 箴6:9懒惰人哪，你要睡到几时呢。你何时睡醒呢。

sent.orig: Of course, sometime legit circumstances may arise that prevent it.
sent.trans: 当然，有时客观条件使得我们无法这样做。

sent.orig: The difficulties in surface wave problems arise from the freesurface conditions.
sent.trans: 表面波问题的困难来自由表面的条件。
